I know who I'm betting on for 2020 but we have to get going at high speed if we're going to win.  Let's start right now – chip in before our end-of-month fundraising deadline.   https://t.co/2LJufvHgw7 https://t.co/BDlHf51VjK
Our movement is powered by grassroots activism and enthusiasm.  Theirs is powered by the biggest special interests SuperPACs and dark dark money.
The goal is simple: we must get to work implementing progressive policies that will improve the lives of all Americans.  We can't expect it to be easy. It's going to take hard work and resolve.

As we hit the heat of summer I want us to remember how important our victories were in 2018 and think about what it means for 2020.  Our movement and grassroots moment show that we can defend the House in 2020 take back the Senate and defeat Donald Trump in 2020.

We cannot lose our humanity because of this terrible President. He wants us all to turn on each other – but instead we need to turn to each other – Democrats and Republicans alike – and reject everything he stands for.

Do everything in your power to build the grassroots movement we need to impeach.  But perhaps most important of all – fight back by standing up for what we believe in. When you see or here something that you know is wrong say something.

I know you all are fighting like hell. Don’t give up. We need to organize even harder. Call your friends and family and urge them to get involved – especially if they live in a Republican district. Donate to candidates that are taking on Trump.
We need to reject Trump not just in Washington D.C. but in ballot boxes across America too.
A vision that lifts up the poor & immigrants & unions & working families & students & women & minority communities & our LGBTQ friends and family.
But here’s what I do know – we need a massive grassroots uprising across this country to reject the hate & division & replace it with a hopeful vision of America.
I don’t know whether or not we are going to impeach Trump.
I’m ashamed of what he’s doing to our country and I’m ashamed and outraged that my Republican colleagues in Congress are letting him get away with it.

This week Trump admitted he would break the law in 2020 to win. This man has no shame. He has no problem with Russia or China or anyone else subverting our election. That shocks me to my core. The entire Mueller Report is shocking.
